column1: Sorry, but I've just heard about this fever last night from this app and there is no news about this fever in my country. Cause now ppl in my country, we're interested in and faced w/ the Coronavirus & PM 2.5 dust issues. So  tht's why we have no info about Lassa fever tht much.
